intro_screen_text_1: Fast-Track Your Future with DN LMS

starting: Starting, Please wait for a while
2fa_step1: Link a supported authentication app to your Google account (such as Google or MicrosoftAuthenticator).
2fa_step2: Scan the QR code below with your authentication app, or enter the code manually.
2fa_step3: Enter the code from your authentication app.
2fa_information: Don't have one? We recommend Google or Microsoft Authenticator. Download the app from your mobile store & fill the steps below to activate your 2FA.
2fa_qr_information: Scan the QR code below using a supported authenticator app (such as Google or Microsoft Authenticator).
2fa_qr_not_scan: Can't scan the QR Code? Enter this code into your authenticator app instead:
2fa_confirmation_msg: Once the authentication app generates a confirmation code, enter it below:
password_mismatch: The password confirmation does not match.
new_password_should_not_be_same_as_curre: New password should not be same as current password
no_data_found_des: Sorry, But there is no data available at the moment. Please try again later.
something_went_wrong: Sorry, But something is not right at the moment. Please try again later.
